languages.text: "Я славил Императора-Пращура, чтобы братья и сестры мои могли повторить священные слова со мной. Он бдит там, под неведомыми звездами, и шлет нам свой свет. Он истощен и изувечен, но благость его не позволяет ему забыть о нас. И мы благодарны. Мы знаем, что наши молитвы утолят терзающий его голод, и потому мы говорим к нему. Мы зовем его, и однажды он придет со своими верными, чтобы забрать нас под свою опеку". {n}Мужчина вещает, слегка раскачиваясь на месте.{/n}

"I was praising the Emperor-Progenitor so that my brothers and sisters might repeat the sacred words with me. Under stars unknown, He keeps His vigil, and sends us His light. He is exhausted and maimed, but in His graciousness, He does not allow Himself to forget us. And we are grateful. We know that our prayers will quell His agonising hunger, and therefore we speak to Him. We beckon Him so that one day, He and His faithful may come to take us under His care." {n}The man rocks gently in place as he makes his speech.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я славил Императора-Пращура, чтобы братья и сестры мои могли повторить священные слова со мной. Он бдит там, под неведомыми звездами, и шлет нам свой свет. Он истощен и изувечен, но благость его не позволяет ему забыть о нас. И мы благодарны. Мы знаем, что наши молитвы утолят терзающий его голод, и потому мы говорим к нему. Мы зовем его, и однажды он придет со своими верными, чтобы забрать нас под свою опеку". {n}Мужчина вещает, слегка раскачиваясь на месте.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I was praising the Emperor-Forebear so that my brothers and sisters might repeat the sacred words with me. Under stars unknown, He keeps His vigil, and sends us His light. He is exhausted and maimed, but in His graciousness, He cannot forget us. And we are grateful. We know that our prayers will quell His agonising hunger, and therefore we speak to Him. We beckon Him so that one day, He and His faithful may come to take us under His care." {n}The man rocks gently in place as he makes his speech.{/n}

languages.text: «Alababa al Emperador-Progenitor para que mis hermanos repitan las palabras sagradas conmigo. Bajo estrellas desconocidas, mantiene su vigilia y nos envía su luz. Está agotado y maltrecho, pero en su infinita gracia no se olvida de nosotros. Le estamos muy agradecidos. Sabemos que nuestras plegarias mitigarán el dolor de su hambre y por eso le hablamos. Le llamamos para que algún día acuda con sus fieles para acogernos a su lado». {n}El hombre se mece levemente mientras habla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was praising the Emperor-Progenitor so that my brothers and sisters might repeat the sacred words with me. Under stars unknown, He keeps His vigil, and sends us His light. He is exhausted and maimed, but in His graciousness, He does not allow Himself to forget us. And we are grateful. We know that our prayers will quell His agonising hunger, and therefore we speak to Him. We beckon Him so that one day, He and His faithful may come to take us under His care." {n}The man rocks gently in place as he makes his speech.{/n}

Le llamamos para que algún día acuda con sus fieles para acogernos a su lado». {n}El hombre se mece levemente mientras habla.{/n}
traits.speaker: Lair4GenestealerCultSoldier

languages.text: “我在赞美元祖神皇，这样一来，我的兄弟姐妹们便可以与我一起重复这些神圣的话语。在不知名的群星之下，祂矢志不渝地守望着，为我们带来祂的明光。祂已经筋疲力尽，伤痕累累，但祂仁慈地对待我们，不愿忘记我们，我们很是感激。我们知道，我们的祈祷将会平息祂的痛苦。因此，我们对祂诉说。我们呼唤着祂，这样一来，迟早有一天，祂与祂忠诚的信徒们会为我们带来祂的恩泽。”{n}这个人一边说着，一边轻轻地摆动着身体。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was praising the Emperor-Progenitor so that my brothers and sisters might repeat the sacred words with me. Under stars unknown, He keeps His vigil, and sends us His light. He is exhausted and maimed, but in His graciousness, He does not allow Himself to forget us. And we are grateful. We know that our prayers will quell His agonising hunger, and therefore we speak to Him. We beckon Him so that one day, He and His faithful may come to take us under His care." {n}The man rocks gently in place as he makes his speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我在赞美元祖神皇，这样一来，我的兄弟姐妹们便可以与我一起重复这些神圣的话语。在不知名的群星之下，祂矢志不渝地守望着，为我们带来祂的明光。祂已经筋疲力尽，伤痕累累，但祂仁慈地对待我们，不愿忘记我们，我们很是感激。我们知道，我们的祈祷将会平息祂的痛苦。因此，我们对祂诉说。我们呼唤着祂，这样一来，迟早有一天，祂与祂忠诚的信徒们会为我们带来祂的恩泽。”{n}这个人一边说着，一边轻轻地摆动着身体。{/n}
traits.speaker: Lair4GenestealerCultSoldier

languages.text: 「私が始祖なる皇帝を讃えれば、同胞が共に神聖な言葉を繰り返してくれる。どことも知れぬ星空の下、皇帝は常に目を光らせて我々に光を送ってくださるのだ。皇帝は疲れ果て、体がボロボロだというのに、その優しさゆえ、我々を忘れないようにしている。なんとも有難い。我々の祈りが、皇帝の身を切られるほどの渇望を鎮めることを知っているからこそ、語りかける。皇帝を招き寄せればいつの日か、皇帝とその信者達が皇帝のもとへ連れて行って下さるのだ」{n}男はその場でゆらゆら揺れながら、ペラペラと喋った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was praising the Emperor-Progenitor so that my brothers and sisters might repeat the sacred words with me. Under stars unknown, He keeps His vigil, and sends us His light. He is exhausted and maimed, but in His graciousness, He does not allow Himself to forget us. And we are grateful. We know that our prayers will quell His agonising hunger, and therefore we speak to Him. We beckon Him so that one day, He and His faithful may come to take us under His care." {n}The man rocks gently in place as he makes his speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私が始祖なる皇帝を讃えれば、同胞が共に神聖な言葉を繰り返してくれる。どことも知れぬ星空の下、皇帝は常に目を光らせて我々に光を送ってくださるのだ。皇帝は疲れ果て、体がボロボロだというのに、その優しさゆえ、我々を忘れないようにしている。なんとも有難い。我々の祈りが、皇帝の身を切られるほどの渇望を鎮めることを知っているからこそ、語りかける。皇帝を招き寄せればいつの日か、皇帝とその信者達が皇帝のもとへ連れて行って下さるのだ」{n}男はその場でゆらゆら揺れながら、ペラペラと喋った。{/n}
traits.speaker: Lair4GenestealerCultSoldier

languages.text: "Ich habe den Imperator-Progenitor gepriesen, auf dass meine Brüder und Schwestern die heiligen Worte mit mir wiederholen. Unter unbekannten Sternen hält er Wacht und schickt uns sein Licht. Er ist erschöpft und versehrt, aber in seiner Güte verbietet er es sich selbst, uns zu vergessen. Und dafür sind wir dankbar. Wir wissen, dass unsere Gebete seinen quälenden Hunger stillen, und darum sprechen wir zu ihm. Wir geben ihm ein Zeichen, damit er und seine Gläubigen eines Tages kommen und uns in seine Obhut überführen." {n}Während seiner Ansprache wippt der Mann sanft hin und her.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was praising the Emperor-Progenitor so that my brothers and sisters might repeat the sacred words with me. Under stars unknown, He keeps His vigil, and sends us His light. He is exhausted and maimed, but in His graciousness, He does not allow Himself to forget us. And we are grateful. We know that our prayers will quell His agonising hunger, and therefore we speak to Him. We beckon Him so that one day, He and His faithful may come to take us under His care." {n}The man rocks gently in place as he makes his speech.{/n}

Wir wissen, dass unsere Gebete seinen quälenden Hunger stillen, und darum sprechen wir zu ihm. Wir geben ihm ein Zeichen, damit er und seine Gläubigen eines Tages kommen und uns in seine Obhut überführen." {n}Während seiner Ansprache wippt der Mann sanft hin und her.{/n}
traits.speaker: Lair4GenestealerCultSoldier

languages.text: « Je faisais l'éloge de l'Empereur-Géniteur afin que mes frères et mes sœurs puissent répéter les mots sacrés avec moi. Sous des étoiles inconnues, Il continue à veiller et à nous envoyer Sa lumière. Bien qu'Il soit épuisé et mutilé, Sa bonté sans borne ne Lui permet pas de nous oublier. Nous Lui en sommes reconnaissants et nous Lui parlons en sachant que nos prières apaiseront Sa faim déchirante. Nous l'appelons pour qu'un jour, Il vienne nous prendre sous Son aile avec Ses fidèles. » {n}L'homme se balance doucement sur place en parlant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was praising the Emperor-Progenitor so that my brothers and sisters might repeat the sacred words with me. Under stars unknown, He keeps His vigil, and sends us His light. He is exhausted and maimed, but in His graciousness, He does not allow Himself to forget us. And we are grateful. We beckon Him so that one day, He and His faithful may come to take us under His care." {n}The man rocks gently in place as he makes his speech.{/n}

traits.speaker: Lair4GenestealerCultSoldier

languages.text: "Kardeşlerim de kelamımı işitip kutsal sözleri tekrar edebilsinler diye Ata İmparator'a şükrediyordum. Şüphesiz ki o, bilinmeyen yıldızların altında nöbetini tutup ışığını bizimle paylaşıyor. Yorgun ve yaralı olsa da yüce merhameti sayesinde bizi unutmuyor. Bunun için şükran duyuyoruz. Dualarımızın O'nun çekilmez açlığını yatıştıracağını biliyor ve bu uğurda O'nunla konuşuyoruz. O'nu çağırıyoruz... Çağırıyoruz ki bir gün O ve sadık kulları, gelip bizi kanatları altına alsın." {n}Adam, konuştuğu esnada olduğu yerde sallanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was praising the Emperor-Progenitor so that my brothers and sisters might repeat the sacred words with me. Under stars unknown, He keeps His vigil, and sends us His light. He is exhausted and maimed, but in His graciousness, He does not allow Himself to forget us. And we are grateful. We know that our prayers will quell His agonising hunger, and therefore we speak to Him. We beckon Him so that one day, He and His faithful may come to take us under His care." {n}The man rocks gently in place as he makes his speech.{/n}
